subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: By leading the Seahawks to two Super Bowls, Russell Wilson, a third-round selection, has set himself apart in a class whose top two picks were Andrew Luck and Robert Griffin III.
snippet: By leading the Seahawks to two Super Bowls, Russell Wilson, a third-round selection, has set himself apart in a class whose top two picks were Andrew Luck and Robert Griffin III.
